metadata.title: CVE-2022-26184 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Poetry v1.1.9 and below was discovered to contain an untrusted search path which causes the application to behave in unexpected ways when users execute Poetry commands in a directory containing malicious content. This vulnerability occurs when the application is ran on Windows OS.

criterions.comment: poetry-core package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
